name: G4LTL

screenshots.caption: Using G4LTL to perform FSMActor synthesis in Ptolemy II

short_description:
G4LTL is a standalone tool and a Java library for automatically generating controllers realizing linear temporal logic (LTL) specifications. 

G4LTL supports three output formats:
1. Psuedo code
2. Models in symbolic analysis laboratory (SAL) format - SAL is developed by SRI International.
3. FSMActors for Ptolemy II - Ptolemy II is developed by UC Berkeley.

G4LTL is an optional module for Ptolemy II. 

------
Notice: In a separate link (http://sourceforge.net/projects/g4ltl/files/beta), we maintain our up-to-date version (G4LTL-ST) with distinct features: (1) compositional synthesis (2) synthesis with timers (3) synthesis with polynomial input predicates (4) synthesis by taking environment model, and (5) output format in Structured Text (IEC 61131-3).
summary: An LTL synthesis tool implemented in Java
